DescriptionData.Title: Kryvaline One Stroke Split Cake - Fairy Rainbow (30g)
DescriptionData.Description: Kryvaline Split Cakes contain multiple color face paints next to each other, which can be easily picked up to create colorful designs quickly. Kryvaline Face Paints are strongly pigmented, wax-based makeup perfect for adults and children alike. Kryvaline blends in easily and stays soft on skin. Kryvaline is free of any harmful ingredients and can be used on sensitive skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes colors: Red, Yellow, Lime Green, Light Blue, Lilac, Pink
Strongly pigmented and rich in color
Ideal for festivals, parties, events and fairs
30 gm Split Cake is good for 60-150 applications
Vegan and not tested on animals
